core_identity.name: The Ancient Forge
core_identity.description: A massive forge built into the mountainside, with great bellows and anvils of ancient design
core_identity.purpose: Legendary smithy where magic-infused weapons and armor are crafted
core_identity.history: Created by the founders of Emberhold to harness the Ember Crystal's power

factions.name: Master Smiths
factions.description: Elite crafters who know the secrets of elemental binding

districts.name: Main Forge
districts.description: The central working area with the Master Anvil and the empty Crystal Mounting

notable_features.name: The Master Anvil
notable_features.description: An enormous anvil of strange, dark metal at the center of the forge. Runes glow faintly along its sides when the hammer strikes it.

notable_features.name: Crystal Mounting
notable_features.description: A specially designed holder where the Ember Crystal would normally be placed to power the forge. It's now empty, with only a few glowing embers remaining.

districts.name: Binding Chamber
districts.description: A dedicated area for infusing items with elemental magic

notable_features.name: Element Binding Circle
notable_features.description: A circular area marked with complex runes where items are infused with elemental properties.
